name: Kilrizzy
description: Nano enthusiast an NanoCenter web-developer. Creator of [CoinEmbed](https://coinembed.com) and making Nano payments easy to integrate into the [Cantrip.io](https://cantrip.io) website building platform. Occasionally making videos on [LearnNano](https://learnnano.com). Previous projects include NaNote, NanoArcade, SplitNano, NanoRPG, and FakeFork
